channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 2026 NFL Coaching/GM Tracker: Falcons First Team to Interview John Harbaugh
item.description: The coaching carousel for the 2026 offseason is about to get moving. Here are the latest news and rumors from around the NFL!

item.title: Xabi Alonso Leaves Real Madrid after Loss to Barcelona; Club Names Replacement
item.description: Real Madrid announced the departure of manager Xabi Alonso following their Spanish Super Cup final loss to rivals Barcelona.

item.title: Kylian Mbappé Criticized For Real Madrid's Guard of Honor Snub in Barcelona Win
item.description: Barcelona's president criticized Kylian Mbappé following the Real Madrid star's refusal to engage in a guard of honor.

item.title: NFL, CFB Weekend Betting Recap: 'Texans-Steelers Will Decide Wild Card Weekend'
item.description: Books and bettors had a give-and-take Wild Card Weekend. The ultimate winner? It will be determined Monday night. Patrick Everson reports.

item.title: NASCAR Returns to Chase Format with Single 10-Race Championship Round
item.description: NASCAR will return in 2026 to its original "Chase" format, a 10-race postseason that will feature 16 drivers vying for the title.

item.title: Irish's Freeman won't be charged after incident
item.description: Notre Dame football coach Marcus Freeman will not be charged after being accused of battery following an incident at his son's high school wrestling m...

item.title: Parsons wants LaFleur back as Packers' coach
item.description: Micah Parsons and other Packers players said Monday they want Matt LaFleur to return as the team's head coach next season.

item.title: Raiola joins Oregon as Ducks await Moore's call
item.description: Former Nebraska quarterback Dylan Raiola announced Monday on social media that he has committed to sign with Oregon.

item.title: Sources: LSU likely adding QB Leavitt from portal
item.description: LSU is expected to sign Arizona State transfer Sam Leavitt, sources told ESPN's Pete Thamel on Monday, giving coach Lane Kiffin his likely QB1 in his ...

item.title: Koepka returning to PGA Tour, 3 stars could follow
item.description: Brooks Koepka is returning to the PGA Tour as part of a new Returning Member Program, which would also allow three other stars from LIV Golf to come b...
